name: Minesweeper (DaanVerschraegen)
description:
Remake of the classic game. I made this project to further improve my skills with both Unity and C#.

Controls:
* left click: reveal a hidden cell. flagged cells cannot be revealed.
* right click: flag a cell as a bomb OR unflag a flagged cell.
* reset button at top to start a different level.

Cell colors:
* gray/grey: hidden cell
* blue: cell that is being hovered over to indicate which cell you will click.
* red: flagged cell
* white (with and without number): revealed cell
